name: Smart Quiz
description:
🎯 Advanced Multiple-Choice Quiz Component

The Smart Quiz component is a powerful, feature-rich multiple-choice quiz system designed for educational courses. It provides comprehensive assessment capabilities with intelligent features and customizable settings.

✨ Key Features:

  • 🎲 Smart Answer Shuffling - Randomize answer options to prevent cheating
  • 📊 Progress Tracking - Visual progress bar showing completion status
  • 🧭 Flexible Navigation - Optional question navigation with smart access control
  • 💬 Detailed Feedback - Comprehensive results with correct/incorrect answers
  • 🔄 Smart Retry System - Automatic retry option based on passing score
  • 🎯 Passing Score Control - Set minimum score requirements
  • 💾 State Persistence - Saves progress automatically across sessions
  • 🌐 Multi-language Support - English and Russian translations

🎛️ Customizable Settings:

  • Shuffle Options - Enable/disable answer randomization
  • Show Progress Bar - Display completion progress
  • Question Navigation - Allow jumping between questions
  • Show Feedback - Display detailed results and explanations
  • Allow Retry - Enable quiz retake functionality
  • Passing Score - Set minimum score for completion

Perfect for knowledge assessment, skill evaluation, and interactive learning experiences. Ideal for courses requiring comprehensive testing with flexible configuration options.
